cause.description:
World Bicycle Relief’s vision is that simple sustainable mobility is an essential element in disaster relief and poverty relief. In developed and developing countries, bicycles fulfill the basic mobility needs of individuals and have a direct impact in support of healthcare, education, and economic development. Bicycles empower individuals, their families, and their communities.
More information at http://www.worldbicyclerelief.org/about_us/index.php
1. Help people in countries such as Zambia by helping to donate a bike so that they can get around easier.
2. A person on a bike can go 4 times further than someone on foot with the same amount of energy used.
3. In these countries, a bike is as important as a car.
4. A person on a bike can carry up to 5 times as much as a person on foot can.
cause.mission: Our mission is to provide access to independence and livelihood through The Power of Bicycles.
cause.name: World Bicycle Relief
